attributes.action: order an INDEPENDANT and public audit of MP expenses and second home allowances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public deserves an independent inquiry to scrutinise the use of tax-payers money. At a time when the economy is facing recession and the average family find it difficult to pay the bills, feed and clothe their family, how can it be justified that tax payers money is used to fund the lavish lifestyles of MPs including the “John Lewis List” for second homes.
